title: Minutemen Scans Event Pack - X-Men: Endangered Species
description:
X-Men: Endangered Species


With three little words, an entire race was nearly obliterated. Every mutant who dies is one number closer to zero. Now, the Beast races against the clock to save this once-thriving race.


Event Pack Contains the following:

New X-Men 040 (2007) (Minutemen-TheRain & Megan)

X-Factor v3 024 (2007) (Minutemen-TheRain & Megan)
X-Men - Endangered Species (2007) (Minutemen-Megan)

This is the first Minutemen Scans Event Pack. I have many more planned. The Event Packs will only contain Minutemen scans and will only be torrented if complete. Sadly, there will be no Civil War, The Initiative, Planet Hulk, or World War Hulk packs. But there will be others. The following is planned:

* Amazons Attack
* Annihilation: Conquest
* Batman: R.I.P.
* Final Crisis
* Resurrection of Ras Al Ghul
* Secret Invasion
* X-Men: Divided We Stand
* X-Men: Endangered Species
* X-Men: Manifest Destiny
* X-Men: Messiah CompleX
